IonoObservationPolarization_Full.description: /// Multidimensional array of enums that identifies either classic/basic polarization discrimination “O” or “X” corresponding to ordinary or extraordinary polarizations, respectively. Exclude this enumeration if no classic/basic polarization discrimination is implemented. May accommodate other modes in addition to “O” and “X” with proper documentation in notes field.

notes.description:
Notes for the polarization data.
Example: /// Example: NOTES
Constraints: Minimum length = 0, Maximum length = 512

dimensions.description:
Array of integers for polarization dimensions.
Example: /// Example: [1, 2]
Constraints: No constraints specified.

dimensionName.description:
Array of names for dimensions.
Example: /// Example: ['NAME1', 'NAME2']
Constraints: No constraints specified.

data.description:
Array of polarization data.
Example: /// Example: [[[[[[['X', 'O']]]]]]]
Constraints: No constraints specified.
